definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: boil (NH id.; Sir 43:3 Hiph. make hot; Aram [[רְתַח]], rtah. boil);—

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Imv. ms. [[רַתַּח]] causat. Ez Eze 24:5 cause to boil, bring to boiling, c. acc. rei.

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. [[רֻתְּחוּ]] Job 30:27 my bowels have been made to boil without quiet (fig. of violent emotion).

definitions.title: Hiph
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. [[יַרְתִּיחַ כַּסּיר מְחוּלָה]] Job 41:23 he (the crocod.) maketh the depth boil like the pot..
